function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exponentially growing infection rate","Impact":"Economic recession, loss of human lives, humanitarian crises","Mitigation":"Public health measures, widespread vaccination, travel restrictions","Technologies":"Digital contact tracing, data analytics, telemedicine","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, vulnerable groups","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, medical professionals"},{"Description":"Grand lockdown","Impact":"Severed social ties, hindered economic growth, societal unrest","Mitigation":"Economic support, mental health interventions, community engagement","Technologies":"Remote work technology, mental health apps, community forums","People":"General population, marginalized communities, small businesses","Owner":"Government, community organizations, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Inadequate information integration and analytics","Impact":"Ineffective decision-making, failure to protect citizens, increased transmission of disease","Mitigation":"Ontology-based systems, real-time data integration, multi-modal data analysis","Technologies":"Semantic models, data storage software, user-oriented analytics tools","People":"Researchers, public health authorities, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health authorities, government"}]}
